name: Slime Adventure (itch) (AwkwardCrying)
description: Concept for now using easy software to get the idea down first and then build it up from there adding in story and actual progression later. So this is very rough and basic while I get down functions to work correctly but the idea is to play as a hero who is a slime that has tasked himself with defeating a big bad that other heroes believe doesn't even exist. Along the way you gain some followers to be in your party. I'm attempting to bring in a semi-persona system where you progressively gain cores that you can switch between to use different abilities to beat opponents the best way.
